name: Ophiuchus
description:
Most people are familiar with the 12 zodiacs. Aquarius, Cancer, Taurus, Gemini... and so on. However...

There is a 13th zodiac...

OPHIUCHUS

THE SERPENT-BEARER

In Ophiuchus, control the serpent of the constellation as you avoid the reaching hands of the serpent-bearer and be sure not to tangle up too tight by running over yourself. Last as long as you can to achieve the highest score you can.

Default Controls:

  • A and D to turn left and right
  • Escape to pause
  • Shift to boost
